text: I forgot to order a corsage for my daughter.   I called Ace Florist and they were so accommodating and was able to have it ready for that night.

I was so impressed with the flowers I received for my birthday that I used Ace Florist when I ordered an arrangement for a friend.  Ordered and delivered the same day- they were amazing!  I definitely recommend them!!

They have been around forever and continue to do a beautiful job. 
They never disappoint when having flowers delivered and always come through

I stopped in Ace Florist in Syosset last week to order a bouquet for a co-worker who was retiring.  I cannot tell you how many compliments were received by the stunning arrangement! Long after the flowers were taken home, the sweet sent was still filling the office.  Thank you Pat for creating such a beautiful arrangement!
